mapper.sql: uup_id, uupt_id, user_id, uup_time, uup_info, wl_id
mapper.select: select uup_id, uup.uupt_id, user_id, uup_time, uup_info, uupt.uupt_info, uup.wl_id, wl.wl_title, wt.wt_code , uupt.uupt_primary_point from user_update_points uup left join user_update_points_type uupt on uup.uupt_id = uupt.uupt_id left join work_list wl on uup.wl_id = wl.wl_id left join work_type wt on wl.wt_id = wt.wt_id where user_id = #{userId} and uup.wl_id = #{wlId}

select uup_id, uup.uupt_id, user_id, uup_time, uup_info, uupt.uupt_info, uup.wl_id, wl.wl_title, wt.wt_code from user_update_points uup left join user_update_points_type uupt on uup.uupt_id = uupt.uupt_id left join work_list wl on uup.wl_id = wl.wl_id left join work_type wt on wl.wt_id = wt.wt_id where user_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into user_update_points (uup_id, uupt_id, user_id, uup_time, uup_info, wl_id) values (#{uupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uuptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{uupInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

uup_id,

mapper.update:
update user_update_points
uupt_id = #{uuptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
uup_time = #{uupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
uup_info = #{uupInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wl_id = #{wlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where uup_id = #{uupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update user_update_points set uupt_id = #{uuptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uup_time = #{uupTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, wl_id = #{wlId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, uup_info = #{uupInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where uup_id = #{uupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
